original_text: Eshton was the father of Beth Rapha, Paseah and Tehinnah the father of Ir Nahash. These were the men of Rekah.
korean_text: 에스돈은 베드라바와 바세아와 이르나하스의 아버지 드힌나를 낳았으니 이는 다 레가 사람이며

sentences.original_text: Eshton was the father of Beth Rapha
Paseah and Tehinnah the father of Ir Nahash
These were the men of Rekah
